mn56:2.4: kho, tapassi → dīghatapassī (s1) | dīghatapassi (s2, s3, km, mr)
mn56:7.9: nipphoṭeyya → nicchodeyya (bj) | nicchādeyya (si, pts1, mr) | nippoṭheyya (s2, s3, km) | niccoṭeyya (mr), vālaṃ → thālaṃ (s1-3, mr)
mn56:11.8: “Manasi karohi, gahapati → gahapati gahapati (sī1, pā1), gahapati gahapati manasikarohi (syā1-3, kaṃ), gahapati manasi karohi (ka-ma)
mn56:18.1: anupubbiṃ kathaṃ → ānupubbīkathaṃ (bj) | anupubbikathaṃ (s1-3, km, mr) | ānupubbikathaṃ (pts1)
